tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pollutants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source VARCHAR(255),
  pollutant_type VARCHAR(255),
  concentration DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Pollutants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  type TEXT,
  source_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES Sources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sources_of_pollutants (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(50),
  source_type VARCHAR(50),
  pollutant_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE pollutant_types (
  pollutant_type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pollutant_name VARCHAR(50),
  units VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE contaminated_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  remediation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE remediation_plan (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT REFERENCES contaminated_sites(site_id),
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE pollutants (
  pollutant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  source_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  pollutant_id INT,
  contaminant_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES site_info(site_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pollutant_id) REFERENCES pollutants(pollutant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (contaminant_id) REFERENCES contaminants(contaminant_id)
);
